name: Twitter 2019 - Dark and clean
description: This is a desaturated dark version of newest Twitter styling (by May 1, 2019), designed specifically for working with Twitter in dark mode. If you have questions or suggestions send me a DM on Twitter: @sbezaws
additional_info: Version 1.2: - Color palette adjusted for TweetDeck! - Fixed non matching colors on Search bar (Thanks for the report #Alex Mance) Version 1.1.2: - Fixed Twitter update which showed the menu in the original colors instead of transparent Version 1.1: - Now color variables are listed in the head of the code and can be changed easily. - Works with Twitter in classic white mode too. - Fixed white borders on tweet images. Version 1.0: - Changed background colors in dark mode. - Panel borders set to transparent - Tweet content margins stretched to 7px - Follow recommendations hidden - Main menu position moved down 60px
